en_US.认领失败，这个 package 已被其他人认领: Claim failed, this package has been claimed by others
en_US.认领成功，但请注意该 package 有特殊状态：: Claimed successfully, but please note that this package has special status:
en_US.可以用 more 命令查看完整列表: You can use the /more command to view the full list
en_US.deprecated: 不建议在 PLCT 群以外的地方认领包: deprecated: It is not recommended to claim packages outside the PLCT group
en_US.在使用本命令时，请回复要接受这个包的用户的任意消息。: When using this command, please reply to any message from the user who will receive this package.
en_US.认领失败，该包已被其他人认领，此时你无法通过 /give 转交该包: Claim failed, the package has been claimed by others, you cannot transfer the package through /give at this time
en_US.这个 package 不在认领记录中: This package is not in the claim record
en_US.这个 package 不在你的认领记录中。请联系该包的认领人: This package is not in your claim record. Please contact the claimant of the package
en_US.你还没有认领任何 package: You have not claimed any packages yet
en_US.标记 {1} 不允许手动添加，请考虑使用其它的 mark 替代: Mark {1} is not allowed to be added manually, please consider using other marks instead
en_US.已成功删除该包的 {1} 标记: Successfully deleted {1} mark(s) of this package
en_US.未能删除全部标记，请重试: Failed to delete all marks, please try again
en_US.标记 {1} 被配置为不允许手动清除: Mark {1} is configured not to be manually cleared
en_US.{1} 将被额外添加这些标记：{2}: {1} will be additionally marked with these marks: {2}
en_US.{1} 将被清除这些标记：{2}: {1} will be cleared of these marks: {2}
en_US.该 package 目前未被设定为此状态: This package is currently not set to this status
en_US.表中没有该 package: The table does not have this package
en_US.特殊状态，请咨询认领人: Special status, please consult the claimant
en_US.仅在板子上编译成功: Only compiled successfully on the dev boards
en_US.无需操作即可从上游编译: No operation is required to compile from upstream
en_US.可以通过 add，merge 和 drop 命令来维护此列表；\n使用 more:
You can use the /add, /merge and /drop commands to maintain this list;
Use the /more command to view packages that need special handling.
en_US.该包已被 {1} 认领。: This package has been claimed by {1}.
en_US.该包目前不具有任何标记: This package currently has no marks
en_US.当前群的消息队列中没有 throttled 状态的消息: There are no throttled messages in the message queue of the current group
en_US.{1} 已出包，不再被标记为 {2}: {1} has been packaged and is no longer marked as {2}
en_US.{1} 因 {2} 出包，不再被标记为 {3}: {1} has been packaged due to {2} and is no longer marked as {3}
en_US.[{1}] 已从 {2} 的 {3} 状态内移除。: [{1}] has been removed from the {3} status of {2}.
